(3) Digital Needs Networks

  • Digitalization needs the network effect
  • Every capability must be available digitally
  • APIs are the digital surface of digital products

(6) What is a Product?



Digital Products Erik Wilde (@dret): What is API First? And why does it matter?

(7) Creating Digital Products

  • Easy digital consumption is essential
  • Reuse is necessary to fuel the network effect
  • Product management includes the digital surface

Product as API Erik Wilde (@dret): What is API First? And why does it matter?

(9) Useful and Usable Products

  • Products need APIs to be digitally useful
  • Products need good APIs to be digitally usable
  • API Design is essential for good digital products


Product as API Erik Wilde (@dret): What is API First? And why does it matter?

(10) Every Product is a Digital Product

  • Everybody uses products through their APIs
  • Designing a product (also) means designing its API
  • Product management needs to consider API stories


API First Summary

Outline (API First Summary)

  1. Digital Focus [2]
  2. Digital Products [2]
  3. Product as API [2]
  4. API First Summary [2]
  5. Thank You! [1]
API First Summary Erik Wilde (@dret): What is API First? And why does it matter?

(12) APIs Unlock Value

  • APIs are the digital surface of products
  • Think about how to best expose product value
  • The network effect amplifies digital product value


API First Summary Erik Wilde (@dret): What is API First? And why does it matter?

(13) API First means Digital Value First

  • Manage your digital building blocks
  • Having good APIs helps with making more value flow
  • API value comes first, implementation is secondary
